definition: Kṣitigarbha Bodhisattva, the Bodhisattva of the Great Vow (to save all souls before accepting Bodhi)/also translated Earth Treasury, Earth Womb, or Earth Store Bodhisattva
pinyin: Da4 yuan4 Di4 zang4 Pu2 sa4

definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
to conceal/to hide away/to harbor/to store/to collect
